snippet.title: Switcher – Off The Grid Cinema | Sci-Fi Cinematic by Neill Blomkamp
snippet.description:
Catch up with Grant, a merciless Zero out for one thing and one thing only — himself. This mission is a means to an end for Grant, but it might not be the end his employers necessarily asked of him.  

Still, a job done is a job done, right? What’s the worst that can happen to a Zero who gets on the wrong side of the MegaCorporations? That sounds like a story yet to be told... 

⭐️ Playtest Off The Grid: https://otg.gg/YTPioneers

📺 Watch more episodes of OTG Cinema: https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL4Hpa-7pH59SoVxquNREdOnu_0okgx3ic

----- 

What is Off The Grid Cinema?

Behind the mania of Teardrop Island’s highly televised present lurks its shadowy, secretive past. Off The Grid Cinema delivers an unflinching view of this murky history. Find out more, and gather the pieces of a wider puzzle as you ask yourself — is this all really just a game?

OTG Cinema is directed by Neill Blomkamp, Oscar-nominated director and Chief Visionary Officer at Gunzilla Games.

----- 

Follow Off The Grid’s social media channels: 
👉 Discord: https://discord.gg/offthegrid
👉 Website: https://playoffthegrid.com
👉 Twitter: https://twitter.com/playoffthegrid  
👉 Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/playoffthegrid/  
👉 Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/PlayOffTheGrid/  
👉 TikTok: https://www.tiktok.com/@playoffthegrid

#OffTheGrid #Cinematic #NeillBlomkamp #UnrealEngine5 #GunzillaGames
